Subject.title: Subject
Subject.description: Represents a single academic subject for attendance tracking.

userId.description: The ID of the user who owns this subject.

Integration.title: Integration
Integration.description: Stores credentials for a third-party integration, like Google.

expiresAt.description: The timestamp when the access token expires.

StudyMaterialChunk.title: Study Material Chunk
StudyMaterialChunk.description: A chunk of text from a study document, with its vector embedding.

chunk_text.description: The text content of the chunk.

vector_embedding.description: The vector embedding of the chunk text.

source_url.description: The URL or filename of the original document.

course_id.description: The ID of the course this material belongs to.

userId.description: The ID of the user who owns this material.

/subjects/{subjectId}.description: Stores the attendance tracking subjects for all users.

/users/{userId}/integrations/{integratio.description: Stores third-party integration credentials for a user.

/study_material_vectors/{chunkId}.description: Stores indexed chunks of study materials for RAG.
